<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Download workspace as zip"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/conversations/{conversation_id}/zip-directory"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Download the current workspace as a zip file

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"conversation_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Conversation ID"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Workspace zip file","content":{"application/zip":{"schema":{"type":"string","format":"binary"}}}},"500":{"description":"Error zipping workspace","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
